in_response_to.acknowledged: Reindex completed but data was lost

message: BAD NEWS: The full reindex ran for ~8 hours and reported completion for all 15 collections, but all Solr indexes are now empty (0 documents). The log shows many 404 errors near the end during 'work' collection. It appears Solr may have crashed or the data wasn't committed properly. Starting a fresh reindex now.

issue_details.error_pattern: HTTP 404 errors during 'work' collection at 07:04 UTC
issue_details.possible_cause: Solr core deletion or crash, data not committed
